thread.title: HKEx chief involved in controversial hiring while at JP Morgan
thread.title_full: HKEx chief involved in controversial hiring while at JP Morgan

author: Financial News
title: HKEx chief involved in controversial hiring while at JP Morgan
text:
HKEx chief involved in controversial hiring while at JP Morgan By Ned Levin, The Wall Street Journal 21 September 2015 The head of Hong Kongâ€™s stock exchange was involved in controversial hiring efforts when he worked at JP Morgan, recommending that the bank employ children and acquaintances of Chinese officials, clients and potential clients, according to people familiar with the matter and emails reviewed by The Wall Street Journal.
